pgrid.network
Class ConnectionManager

java.lang.Object
  pgrid.network.ConnectionManager

public class ConnectionManager
extends Object

The Communication Manager adminstrates all connection to other hosts.

Version:
1.0.0
Author:
@author Roman Schmidt

Field Summary
protected  int mAttemps
          Number of connection attemps.
 
Constructor Summary
protected ConnectionManager()
          The constructor must be protected to ensure that only subclasses can call it and that only one instance can ever get created.

Field Detail

mAttemps

protected int mAttemps
Number of connection attemps.

Constructor Detail

ConnectionManager

protected ConnectionManager()
The constructor must be protected to ensure that only subclasses can call it and that only one instance can ever get created. A client that tries to instantiate PGridP2P directly will get an error at compile-time.

Method Detail

sharedInstance

public static ConnectionManager sharedInstance()
This creates the only instance of this class. This differs from the C++ standard implementation by Gamma et.al. since Java ensures the order of static initialization at runtime.

Returns:
the shared instance of this class.
See Also:
Lazy instantiation - Balancing performance and resource usage

accept

public void accept(Socket socket,
                   String greeting)
Processes an incoming connection.

Parameters:
socket - the socket.
greeting - the already received greeting.

acceptanceFinished

public void acceptanceFinished(Connection conn)
The acceptance of an incoming connection is finished.

Parameters:

connect

public Connection connect(PGridHost host)
Connects the host with the given protocol.

Parameters:
host - the host.
Returns:
the connection.

init

public void init(boolean startListener)
Initializes the Connection Manager.

Parameters:
startListener - true if the connection listener should be started, false otherwise.

socketClosed

public void socketClosed(Connection conn)
The socket of the delivered connection was closed by the remote host.

Parameters:
conn - the connection.

the connection.
